description: '''Gloo''' (sometimes stylized in all caps as '''GLOO''') is an English [[electronic music]] [[Musical ensemble#Electronic music groups|group]] composed of musicians [[Iglooghost]], Kai Whiston, and BABii. The trio released their debut album, ''XYZ'' in 2019. Gloo is also the name of the label which the three artists have self-released some of their solo projects under.
